EmailTemplate.name: IRCE Ecom Workshop Followup (Prospect Attendees).Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Nice meeting you at the Best Practices in Ecommerce Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for taking the time to attend the Best Practices in Ecommerce Workshop. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Thanks for attending the Best Practices in Ecommerce Workshop. We hope you had a great time. We're sure you're still settling back in, but our team is looking forward to giving you a personal tour of BigCommerce. We'll be in touch soon to schedule some time with you. Our contact information is below. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have questions or want to schedule time now.
Thanks, The BigCommerce Team ecommerceconsultant@bigcommerce.com <[[mailto:ecommerceconsultant@bigcommerce.com]]> / 1-855-884-6610 <[[tel:+18558846610]]>
